usefulItems: serving plates, round cookie cutter (4 cm)
title: Sun-dried tomato tartare

ingredients.content: 2 - 3 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only

preparations.content: Place all ingredients, except sun-dried tomatoes, into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 6<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>.

Add sun-dried tomatoes and chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>. Divide into 4 equal portions. Place a small round cookie cutter (4 cm) onto a serving plate. Press 1 portion into cookie cutter, then gently remove cutter. Repeat with remaining mixture. Garnish with a caper berry (optional) and serve with  fresh bread or crackers (optional).
